name: Gallente Federation Day
description: The annual Gallente Federation Day event returns to commemorate the empireâ€™s national holiday.
activities: Special ship decals on the New Eden Store
howToParticipate: Visit Gallente Federation space to enjoy the warp speed bonus and see the parades!
Head to the Luminaire system any time to start a race across New Eden from the Grand Prix starting line.
Join the party in Luminaire on June 25th starting at 18:00 UTC.
Participate for at least eight days over the event to collect all the free gifts!

name: The Liberty Ball
description: A lavish gala celebrating Gallente Federation Day with prominent politicians, holographic art, live music, and extravagant displays.
howToParticipate: Secure your invitation through political connections or social standing.
Dress in your finest attire and prepare to mingle with the elite.
Bid on exclusive items and experiences at the charity auctions.

name: The Intaki Harmony Festival
description: A week-long celebration of Intaki culture and spirituality within the Federation.
activities: Traditional Intaki music and dance performances
Holographic light shows inspired by Intaki spirituality
howToParticipate: Travel to Intaki Prime or other participating locations.
Join meditation sessions and learn about Intaki spiritual practices.
Experience the beauty of Intaki culture through music, dance, and art.

name: The Jin-Mei Trade Summit
description: A gathering of influential Jin-Mei business leaders and entrepreneurs from across New Eden.
activities: Panel discussions on economic trends and future outlooks
howToParticipate: Register as an attendee or exhibitor through the official summit website.
Attend keynote speeches and panel discussions.
Explore the exhibition hall and connect with potential business partners.

name: The Mannar Remembrance Day
description: A solemn occasion commemorating the sacrifices of Mannar soldiers throughout history.
activities: Speeches from veterans and government officials
Moments of silence and wreath-laying ceremonies
howToParticipate: Attend memorial services and pay your respects.
Visit historical sites and learn about the sacrifices of Mannar soldiers.
Show your support for veterans and their families.

name: The Black Eagles Recruitment Drive
description: A controversial event where the FIO actively seeks out promising candidates for their ranks.
activities: Interviews with FIO recruiters and agents
Information sessions on the role and responsibilities of the Black Eagles
howToParticipate: Visit an FIO recruitment center and undergo the screening process.
Demonstrate your skills and abilities in the physical and mental challenges.
Prove your loyalty and dedication to the Federation.

name: The Luminaire Grand Prix
description: A high-stakes, intergalactic spaceship race through a treacherous asteroid field.
activities: Ship exhibitions and meet-and-greets with pilots
howToParticipate: Register as a pilot and compete in the qualifying rounds.
Attend the race as a spectator and cheer for your favorite pilot.
Place bets on the outcome of the race.

name: The Crystal Boulevard Fashion Week
description: A showcase of the latest trends in Gallente fashion and body modification.
activities: Exhibitions of cutting-edge cybernetics and bio-art
Workshops on fashion design and body modification
Parties and social events attended by fashion icons
howToParticipate: Attend runway shows and exhibitions.
Network with designers, models, and industry professionals.
Purchase the latest fashion and body modification trends.

name: The Intaki Dreamweaving Festival
description: A celebration of Intaki art, music, and storytelling.
activities: Live performances of traditional Intaki music and dance
Workshops on dream interpretation and lucid dreaming
howToParticipate: Immerse yourself in the interactive art installations.
Experience the beauty of Intaki music and dance.
Learn about dream interpretation and Intaki spiritual practices.

name: The Jin-Mei Tech Expo
description: A display of the latest advancements in Jin-Mei technology, from cutting-edge weaponry to sophisticated cybernetics.
activities: Keynote speeches from leading scientists and engineers
howToParticipate: Attend the expo as a visitor or industry professional.
Explore the latest technological innovations.
Connect with potential investors or business partners.

name: The Mannar War Games
description: A series of simulated combat exercises and competitions designed to test the skills and tactics of capsuleers.
activities: Challenges requiring piloting expertise and strategic thinking
Prizes and recognition for top-performing teams and individuals
Spectator viewing areas and live commentary
howToParticipate: Form a team and register for the War Games.
Compete in the various challenges and battles.
Attend as a spectator and witness the action.
